chara.textHome: I'll slash my way into your heart!
It's me, your beloved blade-bearing beauty!@Sayuki Fumino, cutting iiin!
Whew! Wait, no, I messed up.@This isn't a stage...
A-anyway, do over! I'm Sayuki Fumino!
My favorite things are swords and,@er, history about swords!@Nice to meet you!
The Raikirimaru, or "Thundercutter",@got its name by protecting its wielder,@Tachibana Dosetsu, from a bolt of lightning.
You can kind of feel the power of a@guardian deity emanating from it.
Oda Nobunaga, Toyotomi Hideyoshi...@and then Tokugawa Ieyasu.
Soza Samonji was held by@all three of those heroes!
What a captivating sword...
I've grown! Not just as a @Magical Girl, but as an idol too!
Hwah! I got another move down!
No matter what kind of work I take on,@concerts are my favorite.
That's when I get to share precious time@with all my fans and have fun together!
I'm not too good at singing or dancing...
But there's one thing I can beat@any other idol at, and that's@my bond with my fans!
They're just as warm and supportive@as real friends.
Your fate was sealed the moment we met@here, so how do you want to be cut down?
...Uwhah?! H-how long were you there?!
I won't cut you!
I'm just rehearsing!
Hwaaah! What a great morning!
I had a nice big breakfast...@Rice with miso soup and pickles...
I ate 'til I was stuffed!
Whew... I'm hungryyy.
Hey! We should get lunch together!
Ah, no, no spicy food, thank you!
Hwah! You're a new face!
I'm, um, Sayuki Fumino!
I may not look it, but@I'm Mizuna's local idol girl!
Dio...cleti...an?
Ughhh! I can't remember that.
I can't remember foreign words@if they're longer than two syllables...
Are you still not tucked in bed yet?
If you're still awake in the middle of the@night, the belly button monster'll get you...
My grandpa said so!
Are you free? Then we can read@"The Complete History of Swords"!
There's articles and photos of@all kinds of swords. It's incredible!
Hwahah!@It's time to go out and hunt Witches!
I can't go back on my promise.
I have a duty, and I'm sticking to it!
Nghhh...@I'm so nervous my tummy's starting to hurt.
I get lost on a normal road, so who knows@what'll happen in a house of mirrors!
Japanese swords are so wonderful!
Obviously they're gorgeous, but each one@has such history and passion attached to it...
Wowww...
My manager came up with the@"blade-bearing beauty"@catchphrase for me...
But doesn't it make me sound@kind of dangerous?
I've always loved singing@ever since I was small!
Though, when I was in choir I always got@yelled at for singing too loudly...
My latest song lyrics are about a girl@who told the one she loves that@she hates him.
Ooh, girls at that age are really a handful.
Can't be a rabbit or a cat...
Kyubey's a really strange kind of animal,@isn't he?
Oh! Maybe he's a fox spirit?!
All my fans call me "Sayu-Sayu".
Hee hee,@I'm so happy they gave me a nickname!
They're planning to make an idol glow stick@based on me, but when I asked them to@make it sword-sized they said no...
I go to museums with Mayu@a lot on my days off.
We check out all the@swords and paintings there.
Hah! Yaaah! Take that!
Ah-ah-oops... Aaah!
Guh... I tripped over my own feet.
I love swords, but I'm really bad@at swordsmanship...
Off to battle! Let's have a fair fight!@Got it?
Victory is mine...so there!
I sang sooo much!
That's one issue handled!
I am forever indebted to you...@Pfft, just kidding!
Yuh! Hah!
...I don't think I'm getting any better@at these dance steps.
Hwaaah!
I could probably conquer the land@with this power, huh?
No... The history of Sayuki Fumino,@local idol, is still being written!
Beautiful and sharp...
Y'know, I think Hosokawa Tadaoki favored@the Kasen Kanesada katana because@it shared his qualities!
